member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Log.SetMaxFileSize(System.Int64)
member.summary: Changes the maximum size of TDLib log file.
member.param: The maximum size of the file to where the internal TDLib log is written before the file will be auto-rotated. Must be positive. Defaults to 10 MB.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Log.SetFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets file path for writing TDLib internal log. By default TDLib writes logs to the System.err. Use this method to write the log to a file instead.
member.param: Path to a file for writing TDLib internal log. Use an empty path to switch back to logging to the System.err.
member.returns: Returns whether opening the log file succeeded.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Log.SetVerbosityLevel(System.Int32)
member.param: New value of log verbosity level. Must be non-negative. Value 0 means FATAL, value 1 means ERROR, value 2 means WARNING, value 3 means INFO, value 4 means DEBUG, value greater than 4 can be used to enable even more logging. Default value of the log verbosity level is 5.

member.name: T:Telegram.Td.Log
member.summary: Class for managing internal TDLib logging.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Client.Run
member.summary: Launches a cycle which will fetch all results of queries to TDLib and incoming updates from TDLib. Must be called once on a separate dedicated thread, on which all updates and query results will be handled. Returns only when TDLib instance is closed.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Client.SetUpdatesHandler(Telegram.Td.ClientResultHandler)
member.summary: Replaces handler for incoming updates from the TDLib.
member.param: Handler with OnResult method which will be called for every incoming update from the TDLib.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Client.Execute(Telegram.Td.Api.Function)
member.summary: Synchronously executes a TDLib request. Only a few marked accordingly requests can be executed synchronously.
member.param: Object representing a query to the TDLib.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.Client.Send(Telegram.Td.Api.Function,Telegram.Td.ClientResultHandler)
member.summary: Sends a request to the TDLib.
member.param: Object representing a query to the TDLib.
Result handler with OnResult method which will be called with result of the query or with Telegram.Td.Api.Error as parameter. If it is null, nothing will be called.

member.name: T:Telegram.Td.Client
member.summary: Main class for interaction with the TDLib.

member.name: M:Telegram.Td.ClientResultHandler.OnResult(Telegram.Td.Api.BaseObject)
member.summary: Callback called on result of query to TDLib or incoming update from TDLib.
member.param: Result of query or update of type Telegram.Td.Api.Update about new events.

member.name: T:Telegram.Td.ClientResultHandler
member.summary: Interface for handler for results of queries to TDLib and incoming updates from TDLib.
